body:
Comment 11 by **Vova616**: 
Yes but its executed lots of times because its not giving the other readers to run and
change the condition so its keeping executing lots of times unless I change
runtime.GOMAXPROCS to small value or bigger than work value.
why cant GOMAXPROCS 21 spread the work like GOMAXPROCS 1 or even 2, and why its
spreading the work a lot better when its 22.
the jump from 21 to 22 is 500 times faster.
also with 80 readers and GOMAXPROCS 82 it sometimes can finish the work in less than 1
sec and sometimes can take up to 10 sec.

anyway, I won't argue and maybe I'm not understanding/misunderstanding something, but I
think its not working as intended.

thanks.
